solution_line_template: She takes .75 minutes to answer a question because {time_used} / {questions_answered} = <<{time_used}/{questions_answered}={time_per_question}>>{time_per_question}

It will take her {total_time_available} minutes to take the entire exam because {total_questions} x {time_per_question} = <<{total_questions}*{time_per_question}={total_time_needed}>>{total_time_needed}
She has 0 minutes left when she is done because {total_time_available} - {total_time_needed} = <<{total_time_available}-{total_time_needed}={minutes_left}>>{minutes_left}
